column4: those of you that use awn, are you successful in getting the notification applet to work?  i see only a white vertical line where the notification applet should be.
you have to make sure your real system tray is closed too.
if it's open in your panel, it can't be open in AWN, so close that one, then restart your AWN.
ok, going to give it a try
that worked except it has this overly large white background
I have it too, haven't found a workaround yet for that though... if only I could alpha blend the icons themselves...
it gets less noticeable as time goes on trust me.
have you found out how to get rid of that "no name" icon that seems to be there every time awn starts?
I don't have that.. check your applets maybe..
been over it a hundred times, including editing the xml code.
All of my applets are named and work perfectly (main menu, desktop, weather, launchers, windows,trash,quit, system tray)

yeah, they all work for me to, now that the notification area is set up.  but I have this no name icon that appears every time i start awn.  i can just choose to close it, which i do.  i just want to get rid of it for good.
that's odd. I've not heard of that before. Which repo did you download from?
I don't recall but i compared mine to someone elses on here last night and we had the same version.  they appear to be the latest.
is there a way to get rid of the last gnome panel since this awn?  since awn does it all for me.
I removed everything from my panel except the main menu, and hid it underneath of my AWN (transparent) so that way I can't see it, but if AWN crashes, it's there.
make sense. did that just now.
